channel.title: [317] FizzerX-Scape [ALLSTAR] DUNGEONEERING + MORE!
channel.description:
Hey guys. I am Mod Cody of FizzerX-Scape. I decided to release my server because I am starting a new project. Here are some features and pics.
DOWNLOAD LINK: http://uppit.com/up23vgmf04xj/FizzerX-Scape_V3_For_Release.rar
http://up.ht/11oipDV
FEATURES: -Holds at least 20 people at a time -Had 124 characters -Decent PKing -Dungeoneering -a few customs -Yell Titles -Clan Chat -Bosses to fight -Mini Games: Zombies; GS Mini; +more -MANY MORE FEATURES - IDC IM NOT POSTING MORE LOL Check it out
Yell Titles [URL=http://imgur.com/jUpUGdb][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jUpUGdb.png[/img][/URL]
Train [URL=http://imgur.com/VOkfcDG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VOkfcDG.png[/img][/URL]
Team PK [URL=http://imgur.com/dHphK82][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dHphK82.png[/img][/URL]
Skilling Area [URL=http://imgur.com/Kx0aezD][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kx0aezD.png[/img][/URL]
Shops [URL=http://imgur.com/byHQwsJ][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/byHQwsJ.png[/img][/URL]
PK Shop [URL=http://imgur.com/7Vpob2e][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7Vpob2e.png[/img][/URL]
PK Box [URL=http://imgur.com/F5cDPLZ][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F5cDPLZ.png[/img][/URL]
Home [URL=http://imgur.com/wVkfpUo][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wVkfpUo.png[/img][/URL]
Guilds [URL=http://imgur.com/9VvdpaT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9VvdpaT.png[/img][/URL]
GSMINI [URL=http://imgur.com/J016wvh][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J016wvh.png[/img][/URL]
Dungeoneering [URL=http://imgur.com/QTvGl7z][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QTvGl7z.png[/img][/URL]
Clan Chat [URL=http://imgur.com/lPlOQ68][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lPlOQ68.png[/img][/URL]
Barrows [URL=http://imgur.com/kvroZLa][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kvroZLa.png[/img][/URL]
CREDITS: Mod Allstar - 30% for the source Mod Cody (GodexCAB) - 50% for coding a lot of things Mod ReaperX (ReaperXScape2) - 10% for helping xX4m4zingXx (ruud123)- 10% for helping [X] 10 DOWNLOADS [] 50 DOWNLOADS [] 100 DOWNLOADS [] 1000 DOWNLOADS

item.title: [317] FizzerX-Scape [ALLSTAR] DUNGEONEERING + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:28, topic:521127”][quote author=FizzerX637 link=topic=639638.msg4425133#msg4425133 date=1400485117]

Guess who’s back!!
WHAT’S GOING ON MOPAR!!
I, Cody, (FizzerX, Mod Cody, RankTex) … AM FINALLY BACK TO CODING!
I am not even going to start a 317 Allstar. I have coded Allstar too much. I think I will move to PI. But anyways, mod please lock this topic, the links are broken as Ivan said, and I don’t even have the server files anymore. If anyone remembers me and wants to start a project, hmu with a message, send me your skype.
<3 Love you all

I am back to coding as well…even with 2 jobs and a life… but it will always be an Allstar

Ivan! bro send me your skype name in a pm, or here if you dont mind. id love to see your server too btw
[/quote]
My Skype got hacked by some piece of shit… and I cbf to make another with all the contacts I lost…
Tbh my Skype getting hacked just helps me transition my life away from RSPS but I’m back for now and I want to code! let’s relive allstar![/quote]

Good for all of you coming back. I hope to see big things from all of you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] FizzerX-Scape [ALLSTAR] DUNGEONEERING + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:16, topic:521127”][quote author=Zandstorm2 link=topic=639638.msg4311322#msg4311322 date=1370787430]
Why aren’t you posting pictures of your ‘working Dungeoneering’?
[/quote]

Dungeoneering!!!
[URL=http://imgur.com/5Z5n7AF][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/1uxQdvK][/URL][URL=http://imgur.com/x3ZB78c][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/iOo8vMv][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/LsWVeZk][/URL][/quote]
Cody, it’s Ivan. You’re dungeoneering is just a rip from the multiple minigames that came stock with allstarscapev2…
You kill a NPC and get teleported to another location to kill another NPC, and repeat.
Btw, who ever clicks the NPC last (before it dies and completely disappears) will be teleported…not the one who actually killed it or did the most damage.
Also, you shoulda just let me code for you lol

P.S.
Don’t ask me how I know :palm: but the download links are down.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] FizzerX-Scape [ALLSTAR] DUNGEONEERING + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:8, topic:521127”][quote author=GodexCAB link=topic=635461.msg4310246#msg4310246 date=1370634558]
[size=36pt]WEBCLIENTS ARE WORKING NOW! IF IT SAYS FIZZERX-SCAPE IS OFFLINE, SPAM-CLICK THE LOG IN BUTTON ! I NEED TO FIX IT! SERVERS ARE BOTH ONLINE 24/7[/size]
[/quote]2 days ago >> released one day later

if you’re not going to attempt to keep a project alive; why tell the community about it in the first place? it’s not like this is programmed efficiently/useful for knowledgeable references.

next time, try not to advertise something you don’t have the intentions of keeping running for at least two months.[/quote]

I fixed that problem, so don’t come at me like that, sir. -.- And I only had 20 on at a time, I don’t know if it holds any more. That is why I said atleast 20… -.-

Read full topic
